articles.title: Is It Too Late To Consider Medtronic After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?
articles.mainIdea: Is It Too Late To Consider Medtronic After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: Is It Too Late To Consider Medtronic After Its Strong 2025 Share Price Rally?. If you are wondering whether Medtronic at around $98 is still a smart buy or if most of the upside is already priced in, this article will walk through what the market might be missing. The stock is up 22.9% year to date and 25.2% over the last year, even after a recent 2.5% pullback over the past month. This suggests sentiment has improved but is still a bit cautious after a flat 5 year return of -1.2%. That backdrop comes as Medtronic keeps leaning into high growth areas such as robotic...
